channel.title: Ray Fernandez
channel.description: Ray Fernandez (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: These last few months, we've heard a lot of false information about Bain Capital and private equity.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: I'm proud to stand here ­ and tell you what I saw ­ when Bain Capital bought the company where I worked.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: The experience improved my job and it gave me opportunities that I always believed were part of the American dream.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: In 1996, I became a sales rep at a contact lens business called Wesley Jessen. My sales region was right here in Florida, where my parents emigrated from Cuba when I was 13, a country, where the government owns everything but nothing works.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: Wesley Jessen had been struggling ­ losing over $50 million a year ­ under the previous owner. Then, Mitt Romney and Bain Capital came in.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: Bain Capital saw something others didn't see.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: They invested money in marketing. They brought in a charismatic and dynamic CEO, Kevin Ryan.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: They did everything to make the company succeed.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: This is the real Bain Capital, the story the Obama campaign doesn't want you to hear.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: Because of Bain Capital's attention and management, Wesley Jessen roared back. Workers like me, were inspired by what we saw ­ and our careers thrived.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: And when the company went public a few years later, I was well rewarded. With that money, my wife Sylvia, who is a pharmacist, and I started our own business in Hialeah, Florida ­ Vida Pharmacy.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: None of this would have been possible without Bain Capital's investment. They brought a vision and commitment to a struggling company.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: As a result, we are doing what we love, serving our community. We are building our future.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: Stories like this need to be told. My life today is better because of Bain Capital.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: Mitt Romney helped turn around my company.
item.author: Ray Fernandez

item.title: I can't imagine anyone better prepared to turn around this country.
item.author: Ray Fernandez
